post:
![](https://clients.quadcone.com/images/logo.png)

Bringing the first shared hosting offer for LowEndTalk. Quadcone, providing hosting services since 2012.

Features, Perks and Price
-----------

* 6 GB SSD
* 1 Addon domain
* Unmetered Bandwidth
* Unlimited FTP, Mail, Subdomains and Free SSL (Let's Encrypt &hearts;)
* cPanel with CloudLinux
* Multiple PHP version (5.3 - 7.0)
* CageFS secure
* Free native IPv4 + IPv6 address per account.
* Mod Security with optimized rulesets for SQLi
* Free Script installer
* One click CloudFlare setup, Free!

### *$3.50 / year*
Order at: [https://clients.quadcone.com/?/cart/let-offers/](https://clients.quadcone.com/?/cart/let-offers/) <br>
Shared Plans FAQ: [http://www.quadcone.com/shared/faq/](http://www.quadcone.com/shared/faq/)

Multiple orders per single account allowed

Addons
-----------
Account migrations: Free

About Us
-----------
Datacenter:  [Multacom](http://www.quadcone.com/datacenter/), US West Coast

For any questions reply to thread and I'll be more than happy to answer them!

Thanks, <br>
Quadcone, LLC
